thread.title: Woman films herself carrying out sex act in courthouse 'to get herself out of trouble' - Mirror Online
thread.title_full: Woman films herself carrying out sex act in courthouse 'to get herself out of trouble' - Mirror Online

author: Chris Murphy
title: Woman films herself carrying out sex act in courthouse 'to get herself out of trouble' - Mirror Online
text:
News Woman films herself carrying out sex act in courthouse 'to get herself out of trouble' The woman's father says he's not ashamed of her after the clip was widely shared on social media, but is disappointed Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Woman films herself carrying out sex act in court Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Police have launched an investigation after a woman filmed herself performing a sex act on a man inside a courthouse and posted the video on Twitter . 
After sharing the explicit clip online the 26-year-old woman boasted that it was to get her out of trouble without revealing what kind of trouble she was in. 
The 34-second video showed a sex act on a bench in a corridor outside a courtroom, but has been deleted from the woman's Twitter account. 
Her father told local media that he's not ashamed of his daughter after the clip was widely shared on social media, but is disappointed by the decision she made. The 34-second video showed a sex act on a bench in a corridor (Photo: Chris Murphy) A scene from the smartphone video posted on Twitter (Photo: Chris Murphy) 
The shocking incident occurred during business hours at the Duval County Courthouse in Jacksonville, Florida, and the mobile phone footage was posted online on Tuesday, News4Jax reported. Read More CCTV cameras catch alleged gangland hitman and girlfriend secretly romping at high-security prison 
The woman wrote on Twitter: “Had so much fun at court today. Found a way to get my charges dropped.... h don't tell.” 
Chief Judge Mark Mahon said he was disgusted by the video's contents, and the two people involved are not employees of the courthouse. 
The Jacksonville Sheriff's Office Integrity Unit, which looks into operations of court employees, is investigating, but said no one has been charged. The woman's post was widely shared on social media (Photo: Chris Murphy) 
A police report said the sex act was captured by CCTV and consisted of a man and woman engaging in what appeared to be inappropriate behaviour on the fourth floor of the courthouse. 
The woman was at the courthouse for a 9am arraignment on charges of possession of drug paraphernalia, smuggling contraband into jail and violation of probation. 
Court records show she pleaded no contest, News4Jax reported. 
A no contest plea is entered when a defendant concedes the alleged offences without disputing or admitting guilt. The incident occurred at Duval County Courthouse in Florida (Photo: Googlemaps) 
She was sentenced to time served, which was two days in jail, and then fined and released, Jacksonville.com reported. Read More Human porn stars will be replaced by 'virtual actors' in the future as viewers choose polygons over people 
Police have identified the man in the video, the report added. 
The woman's father told News4Jax said several people called or sent text messages telling him to look at news reports online. 
He said: "When I went on and saw my daughter, I was shocked - very, very shocked." 
The woman is a mother to a young son, her grandmother said, adding: "I would hate for him to turn on TV and see his mom. That’s very very upsetting to me." Like us on Facebook
